title: Seahawks-49ers MNF Recap, Top 5 Most Exciting Players in the NFL (Football 11/12)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap the Seahawks thrilling overtime victory over the 49ers on Monday Night Football (2:00). The guys discuss late-game decision-making, a lack of confidence in Jimmy Garoppolo, Russell Wilson strengthening his MVP candidacy, continued poor officiating and more as Seattle handed San Francisco their first loss of the season. Then, the guys recap news around the league (40:30) including Dwayne Haskins being named the Redskins starter for the remainder of the year, Ryan Fitzpatrick sticking around as the Dolphins starter, the Colts hope to get Jacoby Brissett back and a non-update on Matthew Stafford's injury. If you were to re-pick the 2018 NFL Draft, what would the top 10 look like (53:30)? Finally, the Pick Six Superfriends break down their Top 5 Most Exciting Players in the NFL (58:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
